creditline: Lent by the Curtis Galleries, Inc.
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: bird shaped hat, decorated with blue-green pigment and mother-of-pearl; bird is wearing a headpiece with 10 inch long, white fur; animal hair under bird's beak; inside of hat lined with leather; two leather straps
medium: wood, pigment, mother-of-pearl, animal skin, animal hair
title: Clan Hat
